# pleasantpassword_folder_root (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving the top-level root folder information

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pleasantpassword_folder_root" "root_folder_id" {
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The identifier of the folder root
